name: Binary Clara Library
summary: Learn about .BLIBCLARA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Gameloft is a French video game publisher that was founded in 1999. Many of the publisher's more recent video games, particularly those published for mobile devices, include BLIBCLARA and BCLARA files. These files are game data files that were originally created in the LIBCLARA and CLARA formats, using Gameloft's proprietary Clara game design software, before being binarized and distributed within finished video games.
The following Gameloft games are known to use BLIBCLARA files:

description: A BLIBCLARA file is a binary game data file used in video games developed by Gameloft. It contains level or item data used in a game. BLIBCLARA files and .BCLARA files are created using Clara, a proprietary Gameloft game design software.

instructions: BLIBCLARA files are not meant to be opened. While some gamers have attempted to deserialize BLIBCLARA files and convert them to an editable XML format, those gamers have so far been unsuccessful.
